A gorgeous redhead with emerald green eyes appeared in your field of vision. She was dressed in the school gym uniform and had her wavy hair pulled back in a ponytail. She was slender and tall; her body was well proportioned for her size: nothing was too big or too small. She wasn’t very curvy, but she was definitely beautiful.

The girl picked you up off the ground and held you up with both hands. “A talking skirt?” she asked herself. “Not a skirt, but a man!” you replied. She almost dropped you out of shock, but managed to keep her composure. You explained your predicament to her, telling her the entire story of how you ended up as a piece of feminine professional wear in a high school girls’ locker room.

The girl introduced herself as Katie, a senior. She was at the younger end of the class and was 17. She had a genuine personality and a cheery disposition, as far as you could tell. She told you that she would “definitely help!” and promised to smuggle you out of the school. She took you to her locker and told you to “hang tight!,” laughing quietly. You had to chuckle at the joke too. Finally things were looking up.

When gym class was over, you heard Melissa’s screams of rage. Someone had broken into her locker, she cried! Stole her clothes! You were pretty sure that she might have dented a locker you heard her punch.

You waited for your red-haired angel to come save you. She took you out of her locker over three hours later, after school had ended. “Sorry, Mr. Jones. I had to wait until it was safe,” she said apologetically. You replied, “Katie, I completely understand. There’s no need for you to apologize.” She smiled and gently folded you before placing you in her backpack.

Thirty minutes later, you were taken out. Katie flipped you inside out so you could see and hung you on a hanger. You were in another sewing room, although in a different house. Katie said, “Alright, let’s get started on...”

“...repurposing you into my prom dress!” What?! This girl had promised to free you. She had smuggled you out of Melissa’s clutches and seemed completely genuine. At this point, you were convinced that this school district had a higher percentage of sociopathic seamstresses than anywhere else in the country.

“You can’t do that!” you protested. “You promised to free me! You can’t leave me like this!” Katie was redoing her ponytail, leaving a few strands of her wavy red hair falling down over her face. She pushed them out of the way behind her ears and said, “I know I promised. But this is too good of an opportunity to pass up. Plus, how could I believe that you’re a tiny man stretched into the form of a skirt? That doesn’t make any sense.”

You reminded her that you were once a teacher at the school she attends. Katie wasn’t buying that story. She said, “Some of the students were talking about a tiny little man teaching classes, but he apparently never showed up to class, or a student took him. No one really seems to know.” You shouted, “That student was Melissa! I told you all about that!” Katie crossed her arms. “Melissa would never do that. She’s totally a nice person. As far as I’m concerned, you’re some weird experiment that somehow got loosed into the wild.”

Katie must be one of the popular girls at school if Melissa was nice to her. With Katie fooled by Melissa’s illusion of nicety and not believing a word you said, your fate was sealed. Katie undid the seam that held your hem in place and got out a pair of scissors. You begged her, “Please, no! It’d be like chopping off my arm!” She held the scissors over your lower portion skeptically for a few seconds, then put them back down. “I guess I am talking to a living skirt.”

Frustrated, you snapped, “Wait, you can believe that, but you can’t believe the rest of my story?!” Katie shrugged and continued your alterations. She rolled the bottom piece of your skin further up into your form and sewed it back into place, shortening your hemline to a good 5 inches above her knee as well as getting rid of the kick pleat.

She explained what she was doing as she worked: “See, it’s almost time for senior prom and I kept forgetting to buy a dress. By the time I went to look, they were all out of my size. And then you happen to come along! I’m going to make you into a fun, sexy formal dress.” You retorted, “And just how do you plan to do that? I can’t be stretched any further.”

Katie disappeared out of the sewing room and returned a few moments later with a flirtatious black top. It had ruffles in the front and was strapless. “Glad you asked?” She grinned. “This is the top from an older dress I had. The tricky part will be making it look like you and the top are one seamless garment. Your textures don’t exactly match.” The top was slightly shimmery, and you were rather matte.

She hung the top on another hanger next to you and disappeared again. She returned several minutes later holding two buckets full of some kind of liquid. “What, more dye? Been there, done that,” you said dryly. “Not quite,” she said. “It’s a special chemical that creates a sheen on fabric. With the right ratio, I should be able to match you to the top’s texture. It will also help hide the line where you’re joined to the top.”

Katie hummed happily as she ran you under her sewing macine to attach you to the top. She also removed your zipper during this time and started stitching the area back together. When she saw that it fused back together on its own, Katie realized just what a special skirt you were. She split your back almost down to your eyes, explaining that “Dresses have their zippers in the back! Duh.”

Katie finished stitching the top to you and then started to attach a new zipper to your backside. This zipper was to be longer of course, as it had to zip up you and the top. She installed the two sets of zipper teeth and the slider, further linking you and the top together. Finally it was time for the finishing touch.

The chemical did exactly what it said: it was impossible for you to see where you ended and the top began. “Let me zoom in,” she said. I don’t know what to do with you.” You glared at her in your puddle-like shape. The glue was starting to crack off of you as you shrunk down, but you still couldn’t talk. Anne absent-mindedly fiddled with her necklace while she thought about what to do with you. She walked back and forth in the kitchen talking herself quietly through different ideas while you continued to reform.

While Anne’s back was turned, you finally finished reforming, laying nude on her counter. You sat up and ripped the bit of remaining glue off your mouth. Anne turned around and yelled back, “Bitch?! Look! You don’t know what I’ve been through in the past year. I got laid off unfairly and only just got this job. I can’t lose it now! Plus, I don’t think a little stretchy man who gets turned into women’s clothing is in a good position to make demands!” Then it hit her. Anne knew exactly what she was going to do with you. With a devious smile, she said, “I have the perfect plan for you. You’ll still be able to be close to the students as well.” The amount of rationalization this woman was going through to justify her torture of you was insane.

Before you could protest, Anne picked you up off the kitchen counter and started rolling you into a small ball with her hands. After she was satisfied with this, she rolled you around on the counter, flattening you somewhat. She rolled you out enough until you looked sort of like a little teardrop shape. “I’m going to make you into a nice little necklace that matches my outfits for work.” She grabbed you gently in a fist and took you upstairs to the vanity in her bedroom. She picked out a few different colors of nail polish and teasingly asked you, “which one do you think looks better? The red or the green? You looked like a little tear shaped jade-colored gem that could easily be the main centerpiece of a necklace. Anne had turned you into her personal piece of jewelry.

“Now let’s get you where you belong.” She poked something sharp into the top of your body. It hurt only momentarily. “It’s a hook so you can stay on the chain ... or wherever else I decide to hang you, I guess,” she explained. “I covered it in glue, so it won’t slip out of you. You knew it was varnish, as you could feel it harden over you and give you a sealed, protective coating.

After the varnish finished drying, Anne decided to test you out by dropping you on to the vanity from a few inches above. You bounced a few times with a clacking noise before slowly rolling to a stop. She inspected you to make sure there were no cracks and was satisfied. “With your semi-flat shape you should stay facing forward all the time. So you can see what’s going on.” Anne hooked you on to the necklace chain and put it on. She checked herself out in the mirror. Your tiny little eyes weren’t even visible unless someone inspected you very closely.

Anne took you off and hung you with all her other necklaces. “I hope you’re ready for school tomorrow. I think you’ll make me look good.” With that, she got up and turned off the lights before hopping into her bed and going to sleep. You just hung there, unable to move at all, as the latest addition to this woman’s jewelry collection.

She slammed her bedroom door shut and threw you against the wall. You landed on her bed. âThis is all YOUR fault! My reputation is ruined, Iâm banned from the end of the year parties... GROUNDED!â she threw up her hands, âNot to mention the detention!â

âMelissa, I can explain...â She cut you off. âNo! You donât get an explanation. You only get the most torturous pain and humiliation possible. And if Iâm feeling nice after that, maybe Iâll kill you quickly!â After spending two months with Melissa, you knew that most of her threats were hyperbole just to manipulate you. But this time, she seemed deadly serious. You seriously feared for your life. Melissa was a loose cannon when she was in a good mood. 1141111111112112211112111221.content:
You came up with the best lie you could on the spot to appease the raging Melissa. Melissa had a huge ego, so playing up to that would certainly help. “Katie’s always been jealous of you, Melissa. She told me herself. She knew that you had taken me during that first day in class, and kept tabs on what you were doing with me.”

Melissa eyed you with skepticism that could boil over into rage at any moment. “But Katie’s not in my class.” You replied, “Rumors travel fast in high school.” You silently gauged her reaction for a few seconds. Her gaze didn’t change, but she also didn’t say anything else. You continued your lie: “After seeing how great you looked in me as your skirt, and how much you wore me, she suspected something was up. During that day in gym, she managed to get into your locker and found out that your skirt was really alive. I tried to remain silent like you told me, but she forced it out of me! The rest, of course, you know.”

Melissa squinted her eyes at you, trying to figure out whether or not to believe you. You were unwavering in the face of her ominous stare. Finally, she decided. “Alright teach, I believe you.” Huzzah! You managed to save yourself from possible death and torture. Now it was time to figure out how to escape.

“But that means we have a problem. Katie knows about you, and she might come after you again. You’re mine and mine alone. For your own safety, and my continued amusement, I’m going to turn you into my purse.” You protested, “But Melissa, you can’t!” Your psychotic tormentor scoffed and said, “Are you testing me on this? I can and will do what I please with my possessions. I’m in the mood for a new purse, so that’s what you’re going to be.” Knowing that she once again had you under her thumb, she was starting to calm down. She scolded you in a mocking voice: “Be careful with what you say, my little tiny man toy. You wouldn’t like me when I’m angry.”

Melissa returned to the sewing room. She undid all your stitching and removed the fabric liner from the interior of your skirt form. It felt cold and strange without the fabric liner over your face. Once she was done, you were a skirt-sized slightly shimmery black fleshy rectangle lying flat on the table. After a little over two months of confinement as Melissa’s skirt and then as Katie’s prom dress, your ability to move was greatly diminished. Melissa noted that you were reforming, but very very slowly. “Alright teach, while you get yourself together, I’m going to start on the other portion of this project.” She left you on the table to reform and walked to the other side of the room, cutting and sewing fabric together that she would no doubt stick inside you to somehow make you into her purse.

At first, she checked on you every five minutes. Your body wasn’t changing back any faster. Five minutes eventually turned into ten minutes, and then 20. The afternoon turned into evening, and Melissa came to check on you every few hours. You were slowly turning back into a manageable form, and you were certain it would soon be time for Melissa to initiate the next phase of your transformation into a purse.

11411111111121122111121112211.content:
The summer sun had set by the next time Melissa came to check on you. Your body was half reformed, with stubby arms and legs poking out of your mostly rectangular body. Your head was starting to take on definition too. Melissa proclaimed, “It looks like it’s time for the next step!” She grabbed your lips, one with each hand, and began to pull them apart. Her gaze was one of curiosity at first, as if she wasn’t sure if the idea would actually work. But as she pulled and your mouth kept widening, her quizzical look turned devious. She pulled your mouth in all directions, causing it to expand over much of your rectangular body.

“That should do it,” she said. She had pulled your mouth open in a rough rectangular shape that accounted for most of your surface area. “Now for the gross part.” Melissa donned a household cleaning glove and shoved her fist into your mouth. She pushed hard and deep, moving it all around inside your mouth. This caused your gag reflex to fire, and you choked while she expanded you out. Finally, she was done and you could breathe again. Melissa had hollowed your form out like a sack, with your mouth as the interior. Haha! you thought. If Melissa intended to use you as a purse, she would have to put all her things in your disgusting, saliva-filled mouth.

She anticipated that problem too. She placed eight flexible wires in your sack-shaped body to give it a form. The wires were not rigid; they simply helped define your physical shape. Four wires were arranged at the back of your mouth in a rectangle. The other four were inserted near your cheeks at a slight angle that converged at the front of your mouth. Your lips were stretched out long and flat, while the back of your mouth was forced wide open. Then she turned you sidways with your mouth facing upward. You were now vaguely shaped like a purse. “That’s the perfect shape, teach. Now just hold it like that.” Melissa laughed and brought forth a glue gun. That crazy bitch was going to glue the wires to the insides of your mouth!

“Open wide, teach.” She dangled the glue gun over your mouth, taunting you. She pulled the gun back though, and instead used it to place glue onto the edges of sheets of thin blue paper. Melissa spread the glue on eight sheets in total and then placed them inside your mouth. The glue attached them to the wires. You felt some of the glue seep onto the insides of your mouth, further holding everything in place. A single piece of rectangular fabric was glued to the bottom four wires, while the other wires held fabric for the roof of your mouth, the bottom of your mouth, and each cheek.

The paper tasted like thick, dry tissue. Your tongue was stuck behind the paper at the back of your mouth, and no matter which way you moved it, that disgusting taste was there. “These are special moisture-absorbing pads, teach. Very expensive, very high quality. They’ll catch all your saliva and breath, keeping your interior as dry as the desert.” You already felt your mouth drying up. Did she intend to let you die of dehydration? “Now comes the fun part.” Melissa produced a beige rectangle of fabric and slowly lowered it into you, placing it at the back of your mouth.

She said, “There’s no way I’m going to stick my stuff directly in your icky mouth. Every good purse needs an interior fabric. This one feels nice, don’t you think?” She rubbed another piece of the fabric against your exterior and laughed. The fabric was smooth, but sturdy. “That’s going to be your bottom. But before I continue, I need to make some interior pockets.” Melissa stuck her pinky finger inside your giant sack of a mouth and poked it into the roof. She used her finger to dig out and stretch the roof of your mouth, forming a pouch that ran the horizontal length of your form. She repeated this process on the bottom of your mouth, making a few more pouches of varying lengths. Then she did the same to your cheeks, making two smaller pouches suitable for holding a cell phone or lipstick.

“Now, of course we can’t have the insides of your mouth fixing themselves...” She drizzled some glue from the glue gun into the fleshy pouches she had made and pressed pieces of the beige fabric into them. The glue didn’t burn you. In fact, it was rather cool, and even had a refreshing minty flavor. “The glue is made specifically for bonding to organic surfaces. Very expensive, very high quality,” Melissa noted. She glued a beige zipper to the large pocket made from the roof of your mouth. “One separate inside pocket, and a few that just kind of hang loose,” she said. After she made the pockets, the rest of your interior transformation was simple. She placed the beige interior fabric everywhere inside your mouth until she was certain that none of its true insides remained visible.

114111111111211221111211122111.content:
“Now, every good purse needs a strap. Should I use your feet or your legs for it?” You yelled at her, trying to demand your release. But with the wires, moisture pads, and interior fabric keeping your mouth relatively immobile, all that came out was a series of muffled, incomprehensible sounds. You did make note though, that with enough exercise, you might be able to talk in a more clear manner. Your movement wasn’t anywhere near as limited in this form as it was as Melissa’s skirt.

Melissa cackled at you and said, “Arms you say? Good choice!” She pulled your arms outward, flattening them to make them wider. She stretched each one out about 1 and a half feet. “Now, how to join them...” she wondered aloud. She tried simply squishing them together, but that didn’t work. Next she tied them in a knot, but was unsatisfied with the result. Finally, she decided on a hybrid idea.

Melissa put glue on each of your hands, then she smashed them together and rubbed until there was no trace of separate limbs anymore. You could feel your hands all twisted up inside one another, with the glue everywhere in between. You tried to pull them apart, but all you accomplished was flapping your strap around. Melissa laughed at this, but eventually had to pin your arms down with a heavy book so she could continue her work.

She pressed your legs into your body, having decided that she didn’t need them for this project. “Alright teach, we’re almost done here. I just need to add a few exterior details.” Melissa was excited with the potential the new role you would play in her life, and she started listing off all the things she would put inside you: car keys, her phone, makeup, tissues, feminine hygiene products, and even her trash. Sneering, Melissa taunted you: “I might be using trash cans a lot less now. Congratulations. You’re helping save the environment!”

Melissa’s “few external details” involved the creation of two more pockets on either side of your purse form, one where your chin would be, and another at your forehead. She installed a zipper on your chin-side pocket and a button on the forehead-side one (more stylish than functional). Your eyes were just barely contained within the forehead pocket, so you were able to see, albeit upside down. Your eyes were partially concealed, so it would be difficult for someone to spot Melissa’s purse moving its eyes around frantically in a desperate plea for help.

Finally, she glued zipper teeth to your lips and installed the slider. She zipped and unzipped you a few times, testing the zipper and seeing what you looked like. Satisfied with her handiwork, Melissa turned you around to face the mirror in the sewing room. “I hope you like how you look, teach. I put a lot of time into this. You’d better appreciate it.” It took you awhile to decipher the image in the mirror because it was upside down, but you did indeed look like a black matte leather purse. Your were actually impressed Melissa managed to make you look so convincing. Of course, she did manage to turn you into knee-length skirt for two months and keep it hidden from even her own mother.

You had to escape! Melissa’s reign of torture could not be allowed to continue. In a vain attempt to flee, you started flapping around and yelling on the table by using a combination of your mouth-bag interior and arm-strap. Melissa easily grabbed you and held you in place on the table. She said in an overly sweet, patronizing voice, “Good purses don’t move or make noise. A good purse sits quietly where its owner puts it. A good purse holds all of its owner’s things and keeps them organized and tidy. Are you going to be a good purse or a bad purse, teach?” She let go of you to test your response. You judged it was best to be a “good purse” for now, and didn’t move. To signify acceptance of your fate, you opened up your interior so that Melissa could transfer the things from her old purse into you.

“You made the right decision, my little purse boy toy. Be right back.” She disappeared for a moment into her bedroom and returned with her old purse. She dumped everything out on the table and began placing it in you. Her wallet, a pack of gum, a pack of tissue, and a glasses case were placed on your bottom. You didn’t know that Melissa wore glasses. She put her phone in your left cheek-pocket. A tube of lip gloss and a small bottle of perfume went into the right cheek-pocket. Into the large pocket that she created from the roof your mouth, she placed a few tampons and a pack of Band-Aids. After zipping that pocket shut, she put some lotion, hair ties, and hair clips into the other loose-hanging pockets that were made from the bottom of your mouth. She put her keys in your outside zipper pocket and zipped both it and your main compartment (i.e. your mouth) shut.

You were complete, fulfilling your duty as a purse. The weight from all the stuff inside you pushed down on what remained of your throat, making you feel like you were choking. You could still breathe though, so your nostrils had to be somewhere. You tried to move again while Melissa left the room to put her old, empty purse back in her closet. The weight from everything inside your many pockets was simply too much. You could move your strap more or less freely, but you couldn’t move your body.

Melissa came back and picked you up, slinging you over her left shoulder. “Alright, teach. It’s time to get out of here for the weekend. My parents might have ‘grounded’ me, but they’re not actually gonna punish me. I need a fun weekend to take my mind off all the shit you put me through tonight.” Although it was still prom night, the night was young. It was only 10pm, so it was plenty of time for Melissa to go somewhere and take you with her. She unzipped your outer pocket and pulled out her car keys.

“We’re going to go...”

1141111111112112211112111221111.content:
“...out for a weekend in the city.”

Melissa let you slide down her shoulder and onto the crook of her arm. The sudden force of the landing sent a pang of pain through your arms, but you gritted your non-existent teeth and didn’t make a peep. Melissa might have appeared to have calmed down and be happy, but you were sure that the murderous rage was just right beneath the surface. She modeled you in the mirror for a bit, allowing you to get a better look at yourself. You judged that you were medium-sized based on the purses you had seen other women carry. “You’re a pretty stylish hobo, teach. Maybe I should go into fashion design.” The hobo purse, you recalled from listening to Melissa at work when you were her skirt, is a purse which has a characteristic crescent shape and a slouchy posture, usually with a long shoulder strap.

As Melissa carried you back to her bedroom, the full weight of all her stuff inside you pushed the purse interior down into your mouth, triggering your gag reflex. Your body wanted to throw up, but it simply couldn’t. The gag caused you to twitch a bit, but luckily Melissa didn’t seem to notice. Once in her bedroom, she placed you on her bed, making sure that your eyes were facing the wall opposite her closet and dresser. You heard her changing clothes while she told you about her weekend plans: “We’re gonna go into the city for the weekend. I need to party, since your little stunt cost me my prom. Then on Saturday I guess we’ll pay a visit to some of the normal touristy shit. Well, I will. You’ll just carry all my crap. If you’re good I may let you see the attractions too.” Melissa was so nice. If you faithfully carried all her junk, she’d let you look at a tourist attraction upside down. Yes, that sounded so generous. Not. Of course, if you were in public, you might be able to get somebody’s attention and get rescued!.

Melissa turned you back around and plopped a larger tote bag on the bed next to you. She had changed into a low-cut tank navy blue tank top and a flowing off-white skirt with a hem that ended about halfway above her knees. She put two changes of clothes and a pair of flats into the tote, saying, “If I could, I’d shove all this junk inside you. I’d rather not have two bags. But unfortunately you’re too small for that.” She patted you, as if to sympathize with your pursely inadequacy. “Don’t worry though teach. You’ll still be able to help me carry a few other things!”

Melissa set the tote bag and gathered a few more things for the trip into the city. Returning to the bed, she unzipped you and put them inside you. She placed a small canister of mace and a makeup compact in your bottom. Into your interior zipper pocket she put a tiny baggie of painkillers (“for the inevitable hangover”, she said). Finally she slid her fake ID into one of your loose interior pockets. After slipping into some cork wedge sandals to complete her summer outfit, Melissa was ready to go. She swung the tote bag and then you up onto her shoulder. The weight of the added items caused your purse body to droop more than before. Grabbing her keys, she said, “Alright, it’s time to go.”

She sneaked quietly down the stairs and out the front door, slowly locking it behind her so as not to cause any noise. She ran out to her red convertible, half dropping/half tossing you into the passenger seat and then placing the tote bag in the trunk. You landed in the passenger seat with an unceremonious plop, your body spreading out as was characteristic of a hobo bag. Melissa got into the driver’s seat, buckled her seat belt, and started up the car! She peeled out of the driveway without a care in the world.

The two of you flew down the highway towards the city; the summer night air felt good against your stretched and deformed body. Melissa had placed you in the seat with your eyes forward, so you got to watch at least some of the scenery as she drove. She was passing other cars quite frequently, so she had to be going way over the speed limit. She lane jockeyed between cars without using her turn signal, and honked and flashed her high beams at people that wouldn’t get out of her way.

Suddenly, Melissa jerked the car to a hard left and slammed on the brakes. You heard the car’s tires squeal loudly and smelled burning rubber. She swerved left and right, trying to stop the vehicle from fishtailing! This caused you to slide sideways to the right and crash into the door before being rocketed against the glove compartment and landing on the floor of the car. Your world was spinning out of control and you felt nauseous as Melissa tried to avoid getting into a crash.

11411111111121122111121112211111.content:
Melissa finally straightened out and slowed down the car. You heard her yell, “Watch where the f*** you’re going, asshole!” You assumed she gave the other driver the middle finger too, but you couldn’t see. You were laying on your side on the passenger seat floor with a terrible headache. Melissa picked you up off the floor and put you back in the passenger seat. Muttering to herself, she said, “Maybe I’d better slow down... that was way too close.” Inside you, you felt that the fake ID had fallen out of its place in your loose pocket due to Melissa’s reckless driving. Wanting to keep Melissa happy, you flexed muscles you didn’t even know you had and managed to get the fake ID partially back inside your interior pocket. You then gripped it tightly so that it would move no further.

Melissa noticed her purse flexing and twitching and was confused! “Hey purse, I thought I told you how you were supposed to behave!” she scolded you. At a red light she unzipped your main compartment (mouth) and demanded an explanation. You did your best to respond: “Mmltha, the ID wzz cm-ngwt!” With your tongue stuck under the bottom part of the interior fabric and moisture pad, plus all her stuff inside you, it was difficult to speak. Using your arm strap, you pointed at the fake ID that you had put back in its place. “Im hldnngtt!” you declared. Melissa figured it out. “Ahh, I see. Good job then. You’re learning! Here, let me.” She helped you out by pushing the fake ID down sideways so it would sit better, allowing you to relax your muscles. She zipped you shut and continued the rest of the drive with a smile on her face, thinking that she had you under her complete control. Oh how wrong she would be when you got your chance...

Eventually tall skyscrapers appeared on either side of your limited view, signifying that you were downtown. The highway turned into a bumpy city thoroughfare with potholes every ten feet it seemed like. Melissa brought the car to a stop in a multi-level parking garage. She got out and lifted you out of the passenger seat before putting up the convertible’s roof and locking the doors. Tossing her keys into your outer pocket, she swung you up onto her left shoulder and made her way to the stairs. The garage smelled damp and musty from the humidity accumulated during the day. The parking lines were old and barely visible under the dim, flickering lights. Melissa had managed to park in two spaces. Hopefully she’d get a ticket.

While walking down the stairs, Melissa told you, “If you manage to keep my stuff organized all the time like you did in the car, I might just have to reward you by keeping you as my purse permanently.” She laughed while inwardly you frowned. Out on the street, she didn’t talk to you for fear of appearing crazy. She carried you with your eyes on the outer side, allowing you to see the surroundings. You had never been much for the city’s nightlife, as the few times you went in college you wound up stuck on people’s shoes, chased by rats, or getting lost. Once you almost fell into a sewer. At least this way you could take in the sights safely. Downtown was modernized with towering glass skyscrapers and a number of excellent architectural wonders. Neon lights flooded the streets in myriad flashing colors, and even this late at night the streets were crowded.

The weight from all the stuff you were carrying made for a terrible time though. With every step, you bounced a little and so did the things inside you. It felt like someone was repeatedly shoving a hand down your throat. The weight of what you were carrying and being hung by your arms left you unable to move in any meaningful way while Melissa carried you. The moisture pads inside you made the sensations even worse. They absorbed all your saliva and moistness, leaving your mouth and throat feeling raw and sore. You desperately wanted a drink of water, and would have to tell Melissa about that when you got the chance. Although you needed to escape from her, you couldn’t do that if you died from dehydration!

Melissa clutched your strap with her left hand as she walked. The two of you passed a number of clubs, restaurants, and bars. She stood outside a few venues and read their promo signs, but wasn’t interested in whatever they had to offer. You bounced back and forth off her hips as she walked, so your vision constantly switched from looking out to her left to seeing what was behind her. Mostly you just saw the indistinguishable mass of city-dwellers moving through the crowded streets, but there was one creepy-looking older man that was always there every time you looked behind her. He appeared to be following Melissa, though you couldn’t truly be sure. You didn’t notify Melissa (how could you, anyway?), but you did make note of his presence. While you didn’t really care what happened to Melissa, you didn’t want to get stolen and fenced by some creep.

After twenty or thirty minutes of wandering, Melissa finally found what she was looking for. The line, full of casually but fashionably dressed twenty-somethings, went out the door and around the corner. The building looked high end and rather exclusive. “Now this is my kind of party!” Melissa proclaimed proudly. She strutted up to the VIP line, fully expecting to be let in without having to wait. As she stood in the short VIP line, you could see the creepy man hiding in the jungle of pedestrians about thirty feet away at the end of the block. It was clear that he was watching Melissa. The VIP line moved quickly. After the two girls in front of Melissa were turned away, it was her turn to be judged by the bald mountain of muscles that guarded that precious velvet rope. She presented her fake ID and herself to the man and awaited his verdict.

"You look at bit younger than this suggests." His low voice grumbles.
Hope was shining inside you, maybe she would get caught!
"But everything seems to be in order." From your vantagepoint you hear him unhooking the velvet rope.
Melissa literally bounces past. "Thanks!"

You felt another new low, offcourse she wouldn't get caught. The world seemed to hate you. She unzipped your mouth and put the card back in. "Hold this will you."
It wasn't a question as she zipped your mouth back up immidiately.

Inside it was really crowded, loud music was vibrating your very being as well as the things you contained. It only made the surpressed gag reflex stronger.

You looked on longingly as she was passed a tall glass with some brightly coloured liquid. She glanced over to you and smirked. "I was really thirsty." She remarked to noone, except you were pretty certain this was directed to you. She spent the first period of time just sipping her glass, bouncing along to the beat of the music. 1141111111112112211112111221111112.content:
Melissa downed the rest of her drink and grabbed you as her new friend led her out to the dance floor. She dragged you off the bar through a puddle of water and spilled liquor and pulled your arms over her head across to her right shoulder. She had been carrying you on her left shoulder, but you were now secure on her body with your arm-strap going across her chest. With her hands free, she started dancing to the loud techno music with her new male companion. They didn’t talk much, just danced and danced. As Melissa bounced, you bounced with her. As you bounced, your feminine cargo bounced too. It was like when Melissa was walking, but many times worse.

As the night continued, your arms started to get sore from hanging off Melissa’s shoulder for so long. The constant motion of her dancing didn’t help. Your grip, if it could be called that, became weak and your arms felt like they couldn’t take any more. But with the organic superglue holding them together, you had no choice but to hang off Melissa’s shoulder like a purse rightfully should. You were also starting to get sweaty from the combination of muscle strain and Melissa’s own body heat. You felt sweat forming all around your handbag body and the moisture pads went to work. They absorbed the moisture even through your thin layer of skin, making you taste the disgusting salty flavor of your own sweat. The only part of your body they couldn’t reach was your arms. Melissa was too involved in her dancing to notice her purse’s strap sweating.

Finally the two decided that they had had enough dancing and walked off the dance floor to a slightly quieter part of the club upstairs. “Let’s get this table right here. I need to freshen up. Have a drink for me when I get back,” Melissa said. As she walked off, her companion asked, “What do you want?” “Something girly!” she responded in a cutesy tone. After entering the bathroom, Melissa grabbed your strap, lifted it over her head, and placed you in one of the few clean spots on the counter. “Oh god, you’re disgusting!” she complained when she felt your sticky, sweaty arms. She did note that the rest of your body was dry though. “I’ll need to add some more moisture pads after we get back home. You smell too. Not really sure what to do about that...”

She opened you up and pulled out the bottle of perfume out of your right side pocket, which used to be your cheek. After wiping the sweat off your arms, she uncapped the perfume and spritzed you thoroughly. “This will have to do for now. Guess I don’t need to reapply my own perfume.” She put the cap back on the perfume bottle and then put it back inside you, taking out her lip gloss next. She reapplied it to her lips and blew herself a kiss in the mirror. “You know teach, you’ve been a pretty good purse tonight, aside from all the--ick--sweat.” She put the lip gloss back next to her perfume in your right side pocket. “I think you deserve a little reward later.” “Wttr,” you said weakly. “What?” “Wttr...” you pointed your arm strap at the sink.

Melissa sighed. “You expect me to get my purse and my things wet just so you can have a drink?” You replied, “Nnno. Jst...drnk.” Melissa threw up her hands. “Oh fine! You’ve been a good purse tonight. Consider this your reward for doing what you’re told.” She worked her finger into your skin and poked a hole inside your outer pocket with the button. She pushed the moisture pad back a bit and dripped some water into your mouth. The taste was like heaven. You gulped it down, though you weren’t really sure where it went. “More!” you requested. “Nope, that’s all you get. Now shut up. I’m going back outside.” She removed her finger from the hole in your skin and it quickly sealed itself up. Melissa used her compact to touch up her makeup and then zipped you shut before rejoining her companion at the table.

She placed you on the table, strategically putting your arm-strap under your body so you couldn’t move it. The two talked for about an hour about their common interests. He was 22 and about to graduate from college with a degree in business. He also belonged to a fraternity. They also ordered some food as Melissa was, “Totally starving.” You couldn’t see what it was, but it smelled like something fried. Eventually the conversation died down and the man suggested, “How about we head back to my place?” Melissa responded:

11411111111121122111121112211111122.content:
Melissa declined her date’s offer. “Sorry, I’d love to. But you know, I’ve got things to do tomorrowww.” He tried again with, “You can just leave from my place. I’ll even drive you to your car.” Melissa smiled and said, “That’s nice, but I’ll have to decline.” Sensing her rejection, the guy asked, “Can I at least your number?” Melissa laughed and said yes, writing down a phone number on a napkin. After the guy left the table, Melissa whispered to you, “Good thing I didn’t give him my real number, huh?” She finished her fruity drink and decided it was time to leave. She opened you up and pulled out her phone. “Gotta fiiind a hotellll...” she said to herself in a drunk sing-songy voice. Melissa might have had one too many, but she did manage to find a motel nearby.

It was well past midnight and the club was emptying when the two of you departed. Melissa clutched you tightly with both hands as she was funneled with the crowds out of the club. Once out of the crowd, Melissa draped you over her left shoulder and stumbled her way down the street towards the parking garage. After a brief stop at Melissa’s car to get the tote bag out of her trunk, the journey to the hotel continued. She kept mostly to herself as she walked, but sometimes she randomly shouted slurred obscenities at other people. Luckily, no one paid the loud drunk girl any mind.

You knew Melissa drank as she would sometimes go to a happy hour with her work friends when you were her skirt. But you had never seen her like this. It was an embarrassment, really. She arrived at the hotel and announced her presence to the clerk with, “It’s ME! And I’m here to--*hiccup*--here to ch.. check in!” After a very confusing conversation and some terrible flirting, Melissa managed to check herself in. The hotel was a run of the mill three star affair with basic amenities. Melissa’s room was on the third floor. She just kept pressing the “Up” button at the elevator until the door finally opened. Once inside the room she dropped you and the tote on the desk and promptly passed out face-down on the bed.

You tried to get some sleep, but were unable to because of the uncomfortableness of all of Melissa’s junk inside you. Melissa had forgotten to zip you shut after she took out her phone though, so your mouth was open. With nothing better to do, you started exercising. Opening and closing your mouth was difficult because of the heaviness of your cargo and the wires that gave you a purse-like shape, but you could definitely feel the exercise paying off even after only thirty minutes. You also tried moving your whole body, but that wasn’t happening with the weight you were carrying.

You finally drifted off to sleep around sunrise. You were woken up some time later by Melissa rummaging through you. Looking up, you saw that she was still in her clothes from last night. Her hair and face were a mess, so she must have just woken up. She opened your interior zipper pocket and pulled out the baggie of painkillers. “God, my head... I feel awful.” She disappeared into the bathroom and filled up a glass of water to take the pills. Then she shut the door and turned on the shower. While she was showering, you did your mouth flexing workout again.

Melissa came out of the bathroom about thirty minutes later with a towel wrapped around her body and another towel wrapped around her hair. She pulled out a change of clothes from the tote bag and disappeared back into the bathroom to change. Her outfit of choice today was a purple tank top layered on top of a white one, blue ankle-length boyfriend jeans, and her hair in a ponytail. She put on the black flats she had brought. “Ok teach, today is ‘tour the city’ day. My headache is more like a dull roar now, and with breakfast I’m sure it’ll go away completely. But we’ll be walking all day so that means we need to stay hydrated.”

At least Melissa was acknowledging your needs. You were borderline delirious from the extended dehydration. “I can’t have you dying on me. I mean, who wants a purse that smells like rotting flesh? How much water do you need?” Since your mouth was already unzipped, you were able to reply, “A ltt! Ath mmch as pthble!” Your tongue was still squashed underneath all the fabric and moisture pads, but Melissa understood you. She poked a hole in your side with her finger and funneled half a cup of water into you, which to you was like five glasses worth. You went from completely parched to quite content. The moisture pads quickly sucked your mouth dry again, but you were at least hydrated for the foreseeable future.

“If I decide to keep you as my purse, I’ll need to find a more permanent solution to this. It’s gonna get old really fast.” She let her finger go and your skin reformed again. “Let’s consider water your motivation for doing what I tell you, teach. You behave, you get to take a drink. If you misbehave, you’ll find yourself a bit thirsty. Deal?” Melissa was threatening to let you die if you didn’t listen to her! She was sadistic, but it was effective. You refused to give her the satisfaction of a response until she pinched you with her pointy fingernails. “Owwwyes!” you yelled. “Good!” she said happily. “Now, where are my contacts?” She dug around inside you, looking for her contacts case.

“Oh, you’ve gotta be kidding me... where are you hiding them you little bastard?” She dug through every single one of your pockets but found nothing. With a sigh of defeat, Melissa pulled out her glasses from their case and put them on. They were slim frame glasses and accented her style quite well, but you had never seen Melissa wear them. “I’m pretty blind without my contacts or glasses. Can’t believe I forgot my extra contacts. But anyway...” Melissa dropped a big, full water bottle inside your main compartment. “Gotta stay hydrated all day, teach. It’s supposed to be warm. Perfect for a day in the city.”

Melissa zipped you shut and up on her shoulder you went. The water bottle was extremely heavy and weighed you down far more than anything else you were carrying. Good thing you had started working out. Melissa went downstairs and had some of the continental breakfast buffet before leaving, ready for a day out in the city. The hotel was located in the heart of downtown, next to plenty of shopping outlets and tourist attractions. “Where to, teach?” Obviously you couldn’t answer, so she chose for you. “I think we will go...”

With your mouth still zipped shut and your body weighed down even more than usual due to the bottle you were completely unable to make your real opinion known to her. But your choice words wouldn't have been appreciated anyway. You were really wondering how her parents raised this little bitch. If you hadn't seen her mom you would have guessed that she just appeared on earth out of hell one day.

Melissa went on the bus to the center of the town. You could feel from the outside air that today was going to be a warm day.
As far as you could tell, Melissa didn't really need anything. She was mostly windowshopping. She did go into a few clothingstores and even tried a few tops, but didn't buy anything. Whenever she went to fit something she would make sure your eyes were pointed in the other direction. You didn't really want to see her anyway.
She bought some new lipstick as well as feminine hygene product which she put in you with a big grin. Patting you on the side when she closed the zipper again.
Before she went to hang out on a bench she bought some absorption pads. Giving you a wink as she had them put in a different bag. The package was to big for your form.

Your arms started aching again during the afternoon, so your were very happy when she sat down on a bench and put you next to her. "It's such a nice warm day, I could just sit here and sunbath all day."

1141111111112112211112111221111112211.content:
It was gum. You sat under the bench behind Melissa’s legs for fifteen minutes before she picked you up and to start walking again. Noticing the gum on you, she said, “Eeeww... I need to watch where I put my stuff I guess.” The fact that Melissa referred to you as merely her possession was insulting, but completely characteristic of her. She showed no concern for your well being beyond the bare minimum to make sure you didn’t die. She picked the gum off your bottom and tried to rub the rest of it away with her fingers. When that didn’t work, she opened you up and pulled out her water bottle. She dabbed her fingers in the water and rubbed the rest of gum away. “It’s not perfect, but it’ll have to do for now,” she said, placing the water bottle back inside you.

As she carried you down the street, Melissa told you her plans for the rest of the day: “We’re gonna do a bit more shopping. You see, I need inspiration.” She paused for a moment, as if waiting for your response. Obviously you didn’t give her one. “What kind of inspiration, you ask? Well, I’ll tell you. I need inspiration for what I’m going to do you next. You’re really useful like this, far moreso than as a ‘teacher.’ But I’m sure just like when you were my skirt, I can make you a better purse. We’ve already identified some flaws, haven’t we?” Melissa was right: as far as purses were concerned, you were flawed. But you weren’t a purse! You were a human being with rights, hopes, and dreams!

“You sweat. You smell. You have to drink water. You don’t even feel like a real purse. You might look more or less like one, but you don’t feel like one. They say if you look good, you feel confident. I’ve sensed that you’re not a very confident purse, so I aim to change that.” She turned the corner and continued walking through the city center. The buildings here were massive, each one hundreds of stories tall. You were in the city’s commercial center, and most of the buildings around you appeared in postcard pictures of the city skyline.

“But on the other hand,” Melissa continued, “maybe I’ll find something else to transform you into. We always need to be open to new ideas, right?” Melissa kept talking like this was a team effort of some kind. You weren’t sure why, but it was unsettling. “Clothing, jewelry, other accessories. There’s so many options!” she exclaimed excitedly. You sighed inwardly and decided to take in the sights of the city while she walked. You were half asleep daydreaming when you were woken up by a sudden drop in temperature. Looking around, you found that Melissa had entered yet another department store, this one with its AC on full blast. This time, Melissa didn’t look at clothes. She went straight to the purses section in the women’s department.

She didn’t talk to you as she browsed. The store was pretty quiet, and a young girl talking to her handbag in such a place would likely attract a lot of attention. As she looked at various purses, you would sometimes see her smile evilly or attempt to badly suppress a giggle. You didn’t know what was going on in that head of hers, but you did know that you didn’t like it. After browsing the purses section, Melissa moved on to the jewelry department. She tried on some earrings and necklaces, but didn’t buy any. She did comment to the saleswoman though that she liked a particular necklace that had a teardrop-shaped amethyst stone for a pendant.

She browsed the store for another twenty minutes before leaving. Once outside, she told you, “I think I have what I need” and laughed softly. You didn’t know what she had in store, but it would no doubt be degrading and humiliating. “But right now, we have to get ready for tonight. We’re going to visit my friend at her condo uptown for a girl’s night. I got a text from her earlier.” Soon, you found yourself on a bus back to the hotel.

Back in the hotel room, Melissa placed you on the desk and put her shopping bag on the floor. “It’s a pretty classy party, teach. So that means you have to look your best. Right now, that means no sweating or smelling. Your body is fine, but I can’t have my purse’s strap leaking salt water everywhere. Sooo...” She reached into the shopping bag and pulled out a handful of the moisture absorption pads that she had bought earlier and dropped them on the desk next to you. “Let’s get to work!” She moved to grab your arm-strap, but you pulled away! No way you were going to let her stick more stuff inside you! Melissa laughed, but when you did it after she tried to grab you a second time, she started to get angry.

“I know you’re thirsty after being outside all day. If you want a drink, you’ll stop right now!” You conceded and Melissa grabbed your arms. “That’s better!” she said. The moisture absorption pads were thin and long, unlike the ones she had stuck in your mouth to keep your saliva from getting your interior fabric wet. Pressing your arm flat on the desk, Melissa stretched a part of it horizontally on each side. She laid the pad inside the middle and then folded the two flaps she had stretched out over it and squished them together so that your flesh fused over the pad. After making sure that this would hold, she repeated the process on the rest of your arm-strap. The only place she couldn’t put a moisture pad was where your hands were glued together, though it was a very small spot.

“Good purse. See, that wasn’t so bad, was it?” she said, cooing as if you were her pet. She patted you on the side and got up, pulling a black dress out of her tote bag. “Don’t go anywhere. I’ll be right back!” While Melissa went into the bathroom to change, you tried to move your arms. The added bulk and stiffness of the moisture pads wrapped inside them made it extremely difficult. You managed to lift your arms maybe an inch off the ground before giving up and letting them drop. With your muscles stretched out, it was hard work to move your arms before. Now it was almost impossible. You couldn’t bend your arms and you could barely lift them. Melissa was getting closer and closer to making you into her perfect inanimate accessory.

11411111111121122111121112211111122111.content:
Melissa came out of the bathroom wearing her black dress. It had a low-cut v-neck sleeveless top with a loose skirt that went halfway down to her knees. Her styled black hair was down, ending a few inches past her shoulders. The perm gave it a bit of a bounce. She put her flats back on and kicked her feet up on the table, turning on the TV for awhile. By now you were extremely thirsty and started wiggling to get her attention. She looked at you confused and angry for a bit before remembering. “I knew I forgot something!” she said, playfully knocking herself on the head. Melissa filled up a cup with some water and poked a hole in your skin once more so that she could funnel it into your mouth. “Try to make it last this time, okay?”

After drinking the rest of the water and tossing the cup into the trash, Melissa went to the mirror and made sure her appearance was good for the party. She adjusted her glasses first, then moved her boobs and dress around to get just the right effect. Once satisfied with that, Melissa opened you up and pulled out her new lipstick and the makeup compact. She touched herself up and declared herself ready for the night’s festivities. The final piece of her outfit was a tiny white sweater, because “It’s supposed to get colder tonight.”

Melissa removed the water bottle before zipping you back up, for which you were grateful. When she picked you up though, everything strangely felt much lighter. You knew that you were carrying all of her things, but you barely felt the weight. Holding them in place inside you felt effortless. You weren’t even choking on them anymore. This was a worrying development. Your body was accepting its new purse shape and your muscles were building up the strength required to adapt to the new form.

Melissa needed to take the subway to get to the party. As she walked to the station, you felt a little chilly. It was definitely going to be cold tonight. The train ride was uneventful. Melissa held you on her lap and played on her phone the whole time. Thirty minutes later, she arrived at a high-rise condo building. Her friend must be pretty loaded, you thought. Your suspicion was confirmed when Melissa entered her friend’s condo. It was an expansive unit, covering almost one entire half of the floor. A massive TV was mounted on the wall above a gas fireplace, and the kitchen was full of top-of-the-line appliances. The entire floor was hardwood, walnut if you had to guess.

Five other attractive women were in the living room, all dressed up like Melissa. “Welcome to our girl’s night in, Mel!” The hostess hugged her friend and Melissa hugged back. “Glad you could make it! You can leave your stuff in the guest bedroom.” The hostess led Melissa away from the living room/foyer, past the kitchen, and down the hall. You were placed on a bed with five other purses and some jackets. Melissa whispered to you, “Behave, teach. Make some new friends.” She snickered and left you there in darkness.

You listened to the girls laugh and have fun for hours. They talked about boys and typical girly things, but also more serious topics like their futures and marriage. Dinner was also apparently served, and the wine was “straight from a Tuscan vineyard I went to last summer.” You ignored most of their chatter, instead attempting to work up enough strength to move your arms in a meaningful way again. Your had little to show for your attempts, however.

Eventually the party died down, and it was time for the girls to leave. They entered the guest bedroom chattering away, clearly quite drunk. Everybody grabbed their things, started leaving. Melissa was the first to grab her stuff and go. With the lights on, you saw that you were very similar looking to another black purse in the pile! Melissa reached for what she thought was her purse, and left the condo. But did she grab you?

114111111111211221111211122111111221111.content:
The drunken Melissa managed to grab her purse, and not the other ones. That is, you were still in Melissa’s clutches. You weren’t sure whether to be relieved or angry. On one hand, one of the other girls might have freed you. On the other hand, given Melissa’s sociopathic behavior, her friends might be just as crazy. At least you knew the way Melissa operated. She slipped up once when you were her skirt, and she might slip up again with you as her purse. Melissa wasn’t as drunk as she was last night, so there wasn’t any drunken shouting at passersby on the city streets. The two of you got back to the hotel room without incident around 1:00 AM.

Melissa took a late bath while you continued trying to work out and make your arm muscles stronger to no avail. Melissa went straight to bed after her bath, and you fell asleep shortly afterward. You were exhausted from being carried around all day and trying to strengthen your arms. With Melissa’s belongings inside you not causing you to constantly gag anymore, you had a full night’s sleep for the first time in days. You woke up the next morning in the seat of Melissa’s convertible on the highway. You must have been very tired and slept for a long time. You stretched, which just amounted to a failed yawn because your mouth was zipped shut.

“Look who’s finally awake. I thought you were just being a good purse, but nope turns out you were asleep the whole time. How can being a purse be that exhausting?” You wanted to yell at her and tell her all the reasons why, but all you could do is shuffle a bit. Melissa interpreted that as more stretching and just continued talking. “Well that was a fun weekend, don’t you think? We’re on our way home now. Once we’re home, I’ve got a whole day planned for you, teach. Oh yes. I finally figured out what I want to do with you, and I’m sure you’ll love it.” If thoughts could kill, Melissa would’ve exploded into a thousand tiny pieces. But you just sat there like any purse would. That’s all you could do.

Melissa peeled into her driveway 45 minutes later and rushed you upstairs to the sewing room.. She plopped you on the familiar table and began getting out all the supplies she would need for whatever sinister transformation she was about to subject you to.

1141111111112112211112111221111112211111.content:
“You’ll be happy to know that I’ve decided you’re most useful to me right now as my purse. So that’s the way you’re going to stay for now! Plus, it’d be a shame to let all that work I did on Friday go to waste.” The only thing you could do was flop your strap around a bit, which Melissa took as a positive response, kind of like a dog wagging its tail. “I knew you’d like that decision. Now, I already fixed your strap sweat problem. But the other issues will require the capabilities of this extensive facility.” She motioned all around the room you were in. “I think our little weekend adventure has pointed out a few things. For one, I don’t like your texture. You don’t feel right, know what I mean? Also, I can’t dip my purse in dye every few weeks to keep it looking like it should. Second, I’m tired of poking holes in you to give you water.”

She unzipped you and turned you upside down, dumping all her stuff out on the table. You felt odd and cold inside without her possessions filling you up. She placed her hefty wallet on your arm strap to anchor you down. With your cargo gone, you used this chance to talk to Melissa. “Melitha, please! I dn’t want to be your purth!!” You noticed that you were able to communicate a bit better, probably because your mouth had been stretched by carrying Melissa’s stuff for two days straight. She laughed and said, “It’s too late for that, teach. This is happening no matter what you want. Now be a good purse and think pursey thoughts while I do this.” She turned away from you and started stitching something together on the sewing machine.

Ha! you thought. Melissa slipped up! She left you empty on the table. Surely that wallet couldn’t hold you. It was heavy, but not that heavy. You would be free! You tried to lurch forward off the table, but the wallet held you in place. Over and over you tried, while Melissa laughed and eventually just ignored you as she continued working. Twenty minutes later, you were out of breath and energy, and Melissa was done crafting the solution to your “problems.” She placed her creation in front of you. It was a black leather purse, or at least the outside part of one.

“Ta-da!” she said. “The solution to all your problems. It’s your new skin, teach.” She turned the leather on its side, revealing that it was just a little bigger than you. That meant you would fit snugly inside and from the outside you would look exactly like a black leather hobo handbag. “This will reinforce and define your form, which means you can hold heavier stuff for me. It also means you won’t be able to move as much. I included a little hidden nozzle with a straw too so you can have your drinks and not die on me. Finally, I’ll be lining the inside with those moisture pads so your sweat doesn’t screw up the leather. That will fix your smell too.” She took a whiff. “Man, you really need a scrubbing.”

It was off to Melissa’s bathroom where she scrubbed you clean with soap and water, then back to the sewing room so Melissa could put you in your permanent purse prison. You begged with her as she lowered you in. “Melitha, pleathe... I’ll do anything.” The girl smirked at you. “Anything? Good. You’ll be my purse until I decide otherwise.” She pushed you all the way in and made sure you fit correctly by pushing you flush up against the sides. She poked the nozzle’s straw through your skin and pushed it down past the moisture pads inside your mouth.

“Now to seal the deal,” she said. She ran you under the sewing machine, stitching the edges of your flexible leather shell directly to your skin. The shell replicated your form perfectly, including the two outer pockets and two tiny holes for your eyes. “I want you to see what you have become,” she explained in reference to the eye holes. “I want you to see what your purpose is in life. You are my possession to do with as I see fit.” She held up the side of you with your eyes to the mirror. You were now truly indistinguishable from a store-bought purse. Two days ago Melissa had made you very convincing, but on close inspection someone would have been able to tell that you were made of flesh, even if it was a silky black color. She had even added a custom label to your outside to enhance the illusion. She also added two metal pieces to your the base of your arms to make it look like your strap was adjustable, although it really wasn’t.

“Now, my purse, I believe you are empty and are in need of some things to hold.” She placed all her paraphernalia back inside you and zipped your mouth shut. She lifted you up to test her handiwork. Your leather shell held you in place, causing you to sag less (though still an appropriate amount for a hobo purse). “This is good, teach. This is good.” She got a cup of water and poured some of it down through the tiny nozzle. Parched, you eagerly drank up. “It’s like watering a plant.” Melissa laughed at you and finished off the rest of the water herself.

She put you back on the table and said, “I want you to try moving.” You tried to move, but could barely produce more than a wiggle. Your arms were also still too weak to lift with the moisture pads inside them. “Haha! Perfect. I think we can say you’ve graduated from prototype to finished product.” Melissa picked you up again and carried you by the strap to her room. With the leather reinforcing your shape, you carried her things even more effortlessly. You had become the perfect purse for Melissa, ready to hold and keep safe whatever she required.

She hung you off her closet door handle and ignored you the rest of the night. Eventually, she went to sleep. You too fell asleep, though not for lack of trying. You wished this hell would be over, that it was all just a bad dream. You dreamed of freedom and the ability to move. You dreamed that you were far away from Melissa and this town. You dreamed that Melissa had been arrested for abusing you all these months. But when you were woken up by the sunrise, you remembered that these were only dreams. You still hung on the closet door handle, your arms barely even hurting even after hanging there all night. Was this to be your fate? Forever trapped as a handbag, forced to carry a pretty girl’s things? At the moment, it certainly seemed like it.

Melissa, dressed for school, entered her room after taking a shower. She took you off the door handle and unzipped you, rummaging around for something. She pulled out her glasses case and placed her glasses back in it, then tossed it back inside you. She didn’t say anything to you, or really even acknowledge you. Instead, she was treating you like the object you had become. She left you on the bed unzipped and finished getting ready for school. Then, it was time for her to leave.

1141111111112112211112111221111112211111.content:
"I don't think you'll look very well on my outfit." She twirled around in front to show off her outfit. Her shiny black hair flowing around her.
You remained silent, unsure of what would be the best thing to say.
"I'll take your brother instead." She smiled and pulled a different purse from her closet. She then emptied some of the stuff inside you to put in her new purse. "Or is this your sister?" Her smile widened.
It was a horrible joke.

She then picked you up from the bed and hung you on a hook in her closet. Paying you no more mind than she would anyother purse she turned to leave. She closed the closet door, leaving you in the dark.
Without as many items inside you felt a lot lighter. Despite the thick padding on your arms you found that you could now even pull yourself up a little. Not that it did you any good, you were not strong enough to get yourself of the hook. Even if you could, there was no way for you to open the closet looking the way you did now.
You sighed deeply and waited a long time. Suddenly you heard the door open. For a moment you thought Melissa had returned, however an unfamiliar voice starts humming.

It must be her mother! Finally a chance for escape. "Hep." You were happy that Melissa did not zip you back up. "HERE! HEP!" You tried shouting as loud as you could. All the while lifting yourself up and down on the hook in hopes that that would make extra noise.
Finally the woman stopped humming. You could hear her footstepts approaching, or maybe it was your heart jumping for joy. The door opened and light poured in.
"What is causing that noise?"

1141111111112112211112111221111112211111.content:
Continuity error: Melissa’s mother is established as the principal in earlier chapters, but previous chapters in this arc referred to a different woman as the headmistress. To rectify, we will say Melissa’s mother holds a position separate from the technical headmistress, but she is the administrator of the school.

-----

You were greeted by the not-so-familiar face of Melissa’s mother. You had managed to catch a glance of her two, maybe three times when stuck as Melissa’s skirt. But now you had an excellent view. Like her daughter, Melissa’s mother was extremely attractive. You knew she was middle-aged, but she didn’t look any older than her late twenties. Her black hair was smartly cut at shoulder length and parted down the middle. She was dressed casually, wearing a simple T shirt and denim shorts.

Spotting you, she exclaimed, “What in the world?” You kept bouncing up and down and attempted to explain yourself to her. “It’s me, James. Your daughter kidnahhed me! Turned me into this.” Melissa’s mother jumped back a bit when she realized that her daughter’s purse was talking to her, but quickly took you off the hook and placed you back on the bed. She couldn’t believe your story. “James? The little man I hired at the beginning of the term who never showed up?” You told her that yes, you were him. You also told her the whole story of how Melissa abducted you and tortured you by turning you into pieces of clothing and fashion accessories.

“Preposterous,” she said. “What?! You have to believe me!” you exclaimed back. She replied frankly, “My daughter would do no such thing. I was aware of your... capabilities when I hired you, but I didn’t think you were some kind of tiny pervert with such a disgusting fantasy. You didn’t even wait to get to the know the girls. I’m not sure if that makes it more or less disgusting.” You tried to protest, but she zipped you shut, leaving you only to make a series of very faint “mmpphh” sounds. “I don’t know what’s wrong with your mind, but I’m going to end your fantasy by indulging you in it to the painful extreme.”

She unzipped you and dumped the few things Melissa left in you out onto the bed, and then clutched you tightly in her fingers. She stormed down the hall to the master bedroom. If it wasn’t for your leather shell, you were sure that her sharp fingernails and tight grip would’ve punctured your skin and caused you to bleed. “We’re going to go on a little shopping trip, you pervert. I hope you’ll enjoy it.” Without giving you a chance to speak, she loaded you up with her personal belongings and zipped you shut.

She tossed you into her convertible’s passenger seat and peeled out of the driveway. Over the next few hours, Melissa’s mother bought all sorts of strange items, almost all of which she shoved inside you. First was an extremely heavy yet small set of weights. They weighed you down, causing that original gagging and choking feeling from the weekend to return, but tenfold. She ate lunch and ordered a disgusting fish sandwich, which she only ate part of before stowing the wrapped leftovers inside you. The wrapping kept the sandwich itself from spilling inside you, but the stench inside you was so terrible that you actually began to lurch and heave (as much as your mostly immobile form allowed). It was impossible for you to vomit, and so you had to make due with attempting (unsuccessfully) to keep the dry heaving under control. She bought several other tortuous items and left them all inside you even after you got home. She left you hanging on her bedroom door knob, magnifying the effects of the weight inside you even more.

The blinding pain and extreme nausea eventually caused you to pass out. You woke up later feeling empty and flat, with your vision blocked by something heavy lying on top of you. You were still reeling from the torture Melissa’s mother put you through earlier, and you were sure that she was planning more. But that never came. You sat in silence for at least an hour. Eventually you heard the front door open and Melissa’s voice proclaim, “Mom, I’m home!” Her mother’s voice, definitely in the same room as you, replied, “Come here, Melissa. I need to talk with you.”

Moments later, Melissa’s voice was much clearer. “What’s up?” You felt the great weight lifted off of you, and you were able to see again. Melissa’s mother placed the phone book that was keeping you in place back on the table. She grabbed you by your purse “body” and held you up for her daughter to see. “I found your little friend today, Melissa.” Melissa’s expression turned from cheerful to stunned fright almost immediately. “I... I can explain, mom,” she began. “There’s no need to, honey. I know that this ‘man’ has been using you to fulfill his perverted fantasies since the start of the term.”

Melissa was confused. She thought that her mother was going to scold her. The situation was still bad, but in a very different way. She was going to lose her favorite toy! “What are you going to do to him, mom?” Her mother shrugged. “I don’t know. Turn him into the police? Maybe just donate him to some thrift shop far away so he can live out the rest of his filthy days silently. What would make you more comfortable, sweety?”

Melissa was internally panicking. She had to think of something quickly to convince her mother to allow her to keep you! “I... Mom, you can’t get rid of him. We, uh... I’m actually keeping him away from one of the other girls in the school.” Her mother raised an eyebrow. “Oh really?” With the lie quickly unfolding in her head, Melissa’s natural confidence was returning. “Yeah,” she continued, “There’s a girl at school named Janet. This pervert was preying on her, He turned himself into my bra in the hopes that I’d lend him to her. He’s really sneaky, but I caught him. I’ve been punishing him ever since. He hates being a purse, it’s so degrading and painful for him.”

“You should let me keep him. ‘People’ like him don’t deserve being turned in or trials or anything like that! Plus, he’s like the only good black purse I have. I need him for a lot of outfits.” Melissa looked at her mother with pleading eyes. In the eyes of a mother who thought her daughter could do no wrong, it might just be enough...
